CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" + "&id=" + Id + "&templateid="+Conga_Template_Id__c + "&DocuSignEmailSubject=[Action Required:] Please sign Power of Attorney" + "&docusignemailbody="+ Docusign_Body_Chunk1__c + Docusign_Body_Chunk2__c + "&qmode=DocuSign" + "&docusignr1id=" + Signatory_Contact__c + "&docusignr1role=Signer 1" + "&docusignr1type=Signer" + "&docusignsendreminders=1" + "&docusignremindin=5" + "&docusignremindagainin=5" + "&DocuSignExpireIn=19" + "&docusignsendasuserid=0051M000007XsJE"
CustomField.label: Generate Tax Res POA Form
